body.p: To add a custom view in , please follow this procedure:

ul.li: In your plugin's directory locate the plugin.xml descriptor file and define the ID of the view you want to add. Also, specify the location on screen where it will be placed:<view id="SampleWorkspaceAccessID" initialSide="WEST" initialRow="0"/>
Define the cmsMessagesArea as a static field if you can access the messages area from anywhere in your code.
